revised_title: Numerical Study of Scattering of Scalar Waves by Two-Dimensional Gratings of Arbitrary Shape
tldr: The authors present a numerical study of scalar wave scattering from two-dimensional periodic surfaces of arbitrary shape. By simulating an infinite and bi-periodic surface, they can analyze scattering from two-dimensional surfaces, even at near-grazing angles. This research helps improve the understanding of scattering problems and has applications in coastal and shipborne radar backscatter from rough ocean surfaces.
